post:
Hello,
We are providing high quality web hosting services since 2017.
Our servers are located in Germany.

Our servers Specifications :

1. AMD RYZEN 3600 / Intel Core i9-9900K / AMD RYZEN 3700
2. 2TB NVMe Drives
3. 128 GB Ram
4. DDoS Protected Network
5. Our shared hosting services are Layer 7 / 4 DDoS Protected
6. We use cPanel / Cloudlinux for all our servers

What plans do we offer ?

**Basic Plan**

* 2GB Storage
* 50GB Bandwidth
* 100% NVMe Disk
* Unlimited Email Accounts
* Unlimited FTP Accounts
* Unlimited Databases
* Unlimited Hosted Domain
* Free SSL Certificate
* 99.95% Uptime Guarantee
* 1-Click App Installer
* Free Daily Backups  (31 Days backup Retention)
* DDoS Protection (With an auto DDoS detection, Full ability to control the protection and DDoS Logs)
* 24/7/365 Support
*Price : 2$ / Month

**Normal Plan**

* 5GB Storage
* 150GB Bandwidth
* 100% NVMe Disk
* Unlimited Email Accounts
* Unlimited FTP Accounts
* Unlimited Databases
* Unlimited Hosted Domain
* Free SSL Certificate
* 99.95% Uptime Guarantee
* 1-Click App Installer
* Free Daily Backups  (31 Days backup Retention)
* DDoS Protection (With an auto DDoS detection, Full ability to control the protection and DDoS Logs)
* 24/7/365 Support
*Price : 4$ / Month

**Business Plan**

* Unlimited Storage
* Unlimited Bandwidth
* 100% NVMe Disk
* Unlimited Email Accounts
* Unlimited FTP Accounts
* Unlimited Databases
* Unlimited Hosted Domain
* Free SSL Certificate
* 99.95% Uptime Guarantee
* 1-Click App Installer
* Free Daily Backups (31 Days backup Retention)
* DDoS Protection (With an auto DDoS detection, Full ability to control the protection and DDoS Logs)
* 24/7/365 Support
* Price : 6$ / Month

More info here : [https://www.vingo-host.com](https://www.vingo-host.com "https://www.vingo-host.com")

Our payment methods are : PayPal / PerfectMoney / CryptoCurrencies / Vodafone Cash
Unlimited word means fair usage and not the overuse of space and bandwidth.
